SELECT B.RNUM, B.MEMBER_NO, B.FILEPATH, B.MEMBER_NAME, B.RANK_NAME, B.DEPT_NAME,
B.PHONE, B.TELEPHONE, B.EMAIL FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.MEMBER_NO, A.FILEPATH, A.MEMBER_NAME, A.RANK_NAME, A.DEPT_NAME,
A.PHONE, A.TELEPHONE, A.EMAIL FROM ( SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.FILEPATH, M.MEMBER_NAME, R.RANK_NO, R.RANK_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME,
M.PHONE, M.TELEPHONE, M.EMAIL
FROM MEMBER M, RANK R, DEPT D
WHERE R.RANK_NO = M.RANK_NO AND D.DEPT_NO = M.DEPT_NO
AND M.MEMBER_NAME LIKE #{keyword} || '%'
AND R.RANK_NAME LIKE #{keyword} || '%'
AND D.DEPT_NAME LIKE #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY DEPT_NAME DESC, RANK_NO ASC, MEMBER_NAME ASC
)A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endCount} )B WHERE B.RNUM >= #{startCount} ORDER BY RNUM DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT
FROM MEMBER M, RANK R, DEPT D
WHERE R.RANK_NO = M.RANK_NO AND D.DEPT_NO = M.DEPT_NO
AND M.MEMBER_NAME LIKE #{keyword} || '%'
AND R.RANK_NAME LIKE #{keyword} || '%'
AND D.DEPT_NAME LIKE #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME, R.RANK_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME
FROM MEMBER M, RANK R, DEPT D
WHERE R.RANK_NO = M.RANK_NO AND D.DEPT_NO = M.DEPT_NO
SELECT RANK_NO, RANK_NAME FROM RANK ORDER BY RANK_NO
SELECT DEPT_NO, DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT ORDER BY DEPT_NO

SELECT MEMBER_NO,
DEPT_NO, RANK_NO, MEMBER_NAME, PHONE, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, ENROLL_DATE, FILEPATH, 'FILE' FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
